name: Super Pet Fighter: Re-hamstered Edition
description:
In Super Pet Fighter: Re-hamstered Edition, you'll face off against pets and their owners to be crowned the New Roshamburg City Rock Paper Scissors champion. Choose from 4 different pet companions and battle over 20 unique pets (7 in current build) to claim the top spot in town. You can purchase upgrades to strengthen your pet and potions to heal them. But it all comes down to reading your opponent in a classic Rachambo matchup between pets. Will you and your pet have an unbreakable bond to the top or will they be taking YOU to the pound?

Liluo link: https://liluo.io/moonlight_studio/super-pet-fighter--re-hamstere
